text: Should `HTTP_PROXY=""` be handled in the same manner as not present `HTTP_PROXY,` or not?

elements.text: be handled in the same manner as not present

text: I'm not in favor of unnecessary tagging people, but since there is no response yet, <@U6NFPDBV1> what do you think, is this a bug that they are not handled in same way? And if yes, I'll make a PR for it, ok?

text: I've no idea what the right behavior is/should be, feel free to open a PR and it can be discussed there
